trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"></xref> interface to create a request message that acts as a method call on a remote object.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> contains remoting data that is passed between message sinks.
A remoting client sends a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> message to a server.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> class from an array of remoting headers.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
An array of remoting headers that contains key/value pairs.

This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> fields for headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> class by copying an existing message.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> interface.
A remoting message.
Gets the number of arguments passed to a method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the number of arguments passed to a method.
Gets an array of arguments passed to a method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the arguments passed to a method.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.ExternalProperties> field is also accessible through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.Properties%2A> property.
Gets a method argument, as an object, at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument as an object.
Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument.
Gets a method argument at a specified index that is not marked as an `out` parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument that is not marked as an `out` parameter.
Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index that is not marked as an `out` parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument that is not marked as an `out` parameter.

The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)"></xref> method is not implemented.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.GetObjectData%2A> method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
The data for serializing or deserializing the remote object.
The context of a certain serialized stream.
Gets a value that indicates whether the method can accept a variable number of arguments.
The method belongs to a remote object.
`true` if the method can accept a variable number of arguments; otherwise, `false`.
Initializes an internal serialization handler from an array of remoting headers that are applied to a method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The value of the first header in the input array is the method name.
An array of remoting headers that contain key/value pairs.

This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref> fields for headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
An internal serialization handler.
Gets the number of arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the number of arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
Gets an array of arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents arguments in the method call that are not marked as `out` parameters.
Initializes a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
Gets the <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodBase"></xref> of the called method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodBase"></xref> of the called method.
Gets the name of the invoked method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the invoked method.
Gets an object that contains the method signature.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the method signature.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.Properties%2A> property returns the value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.ExternalProperties> field.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
Sets method information from previously initialized remoting message properties.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.MethodBase%2A> property is set through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCall.ResolveMethod%2A> method.
Sets method information from serialization settings.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The data for serializing or deserializing the remote object.
The context of a given serialized stream.
Gets the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
The URI of a remote object.
